reviewText: Not ONE new engine on this DVD, despite what the 'Thomas and Friends Yearbook' says.  There is no episode with Molly, Neville,or Dennis on this whole DVD.  There is one, however, with Peter Sam, who cannot be purchased anymore because he is retired. My son is very disappointed.

Since Track Stars, which releases February 7, will be wrapping up season 8, this one might have some season 9 episodes on it.  Season 9 introduced 5 new characters: Mighty, Mac, Molly, Neville, and Dennis.  So this dvd should have seven episodes from the new season, unless they decide to release the remaining seven episodes from season seven. Here is a complete list of the season 9 episodes:

-Percy and the Oil Painting
-Thomas and the Rainbow
-Thomas' Milkshake Muddle
-Mighty Mac
-Molly's Special Special
-Respect for Gordon
-Thomas and the Birthday Picnic
-Tuneful Toots
-Thomas and the Toy Shop
-Rheneas and the Dinosaur
-Thomas and the New Engine
-Toby Feels Left Out
-Thomas Tries His Best
-The Magic Lamp
-Thomas and the Statue
-Henry and the Flagpole
-Emily Knows Best
-Thomas' Day Off
-Thomas' New Trucks
-Duncan and the Old Mine
-Bold and Brave
-Skarloey the Brave
-Saving Edward
-Thomas and the Golden Eagle
-Keeping Up With James
-Flour Power
Thomas the train DVD gives hours of pleasure to 20 month old grandson... However he is not a fan of the hollowen section.
Odered this for my grandson,who is 2yrs. I already have one of the Thomas the Train DVD's & he loves that one.  Thought he should have one for his house.  Shippping early!

Our 18-month old daughter loves Thomas and is familiar with the show, so we bought this video (along with some other videos and a portable DVD player!) to keep her entertained on a long road trip.  The video contains several adventures, and although she had already seen them on PBS, she was enraptured.  She still loves watching Thomas, the ones on this dvd as well as the ones on TV.  A little silver special edition vehicle is included with the video; in our case, it was Percy, and our daughter carried it around for some time after the trip (maybe because it looks different from the others?).  We do wish the DVD was a little longer, but overall, if you are looking for some cute Thomas adventures for your little one, this is a good choice.
All children love Thomas and the tale from the tracks - even with a toy train - will be enjoyed by my Grandson for Christmas.

I just bought this for $7.50 @ Walmart. It is a good show. And about Sir Topham Hat's mother being mad- she's not. Thomas thinks she "looks stearn". He must use his self confidence to come up with a birthday she would like without letting his worries about her being stearn fear him.

It seems Sir Toppem hat is ticked in all the episodes.  he booms, his mother is stern looking on her birthday (who is stern on their birthday &*$# ?)

Some of the faces scare my 19 month old.  There is NO RINGO on this DVD.

We like Thomas. Ideal for everybody; nice stories, nice songs and games.

This DVD has the feature to be in Spanish also. For years we wait some spanish releases to be available. We have two at the moment (as far as I know). Is a nice DVD, I bought it directly from Amazon, and is great. If you have some kids to send a gift to SouthAmerica, send this one.
my little one loves this dvd i recommend it for all kids. its good old fun spent by the tele. even mummy and daddy won't mind watching it with the little one

We are very unhappy with this particular video. When you purchase Molly, Dennis or Neville, there is a description that they make "their debut" in this video. The ONLY place Molly appears is in one of the songs and it is only for a split second. My 3 1/2 yr old is very sad and said, "this is very strange, where is Molly?" He recieved her for Christmas and has been waiting for this video to come out. He finally earned enough reward points only to be dissapointed! How awful!
Excellent!!
Nice show
Kids love
love
Yet another perfect additon to my collection
Clearly says that it comes with train but did not recieve train! Very unhappy! Wish i could give negative stars.
My son likes everything about Thomas, his books, videos, and toys.  Thomas is a nice engine and a great role model for children to have in this day and age.
the kids enjoyed it several years ago when I got it -- sorry the confirmation is late - thanks so much
A variety of adventures with this ......can't go wrong with Thomas the Train, safe to watch, good moral plots. Fun for toddlers.
My nephew is a huge fan of Thomas and Friends. So I bought this for him as a Christmas present. He did not want to watch anything else!
